org.trianacode.gui.main

Interface TaskComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaxFileTrianaTask, DaxJobTrianaTask, IWIRControlTrianaTask, MainTrianaTask, MapLocation, ShiwaConfigTrianaTask, TextTaskComponent, TrianaTask

    public interface TaskComponent
    An interface implemented by all components that represent tasks within a taskgraph
